creator: andrex.puppy@ntlworld.com
text:
I have a file with existing comments attached to cells. POI loads(, edits) and 
saves without errors, but Excel won't open the file - goes through the whole 
open proces, flashes white, then closes the file.

creator: yegor@dinom.ru
text:
Should work now. See Bug 41242 for the details.

Yegor
